title: Roaring Applause
tags: Spell Concentrate Manipulate Emotion Enchantment Mental Arcane Divine Occult
s-fail: The target applauds you so vigorously that it can't use reactions and is [[Slowed]] 1. This applause is so involved that it has the <<tag Manipulate>> trait. This triggers reactions based on the manipulate trait at the start of the target's turn.
s-fumble: As failure, plus the target is so distracted by its vigorous applauding of you that it's [[Fascinated]] with you.
s-hit: The target becomes mildly distracted by your display and applauds while it isn't fully occupied. It can't use reactions.
